0 EAT THE VERDE WAY We serve fresh, bright food that's as satisfying as it is healthy, and we keep ingredients local and seasonal whenever we can. Hand-chopped artisanal greens. Freshly-picked fruits and vegetables. Gourmet proteins. Anything-but-ordinary toppings. Handmade dressings. Whether you choose one of our signature salads or wraps, or build one of your own liking, it's food that fuels your life. Green is good. 0 Fresh Food No MatterHow You Chop, Toss, or Wrap it ORDER NOW LIFE THE VERDE WAY We believe wholesome food and fast food don't have to be mutually exclusive. Our selection of fresh from the farm produce, made-from-scratch dressings, and beautifully prepared proteins take eating healthy to a whole new level - no matter how you toss, chop, or wrap it. GO GREEN Leafy Greens for Your Team Put fresh on the menu for your next meeting or event. We're making catering cool againâ€”with made to order salads and wraps, personalized menus, an in-house catering specialist, compostable serving ware, housemade drinks, and sweets and snacks on the side. Verde Catering
